title: tEDi vandEn aruL
sahitya:
tEDi vandEn aruL nADi vandEn rAmA dEvar pugazhndiDum pAvana nAmA


anupallavi

  pAdi bhajikkum anbarkkup-pErinba vIDaLikkum tanivaLLalenr-unnaiyE


caraNam    shen tAmarai kaNDu kaLi koNDu indEn gItam iNaikkum vaNDena
 nin pAdAmbujanm tanpAl mOham koNDEn pADinEn peravE bOdham
